skills.name: cto
skills.title: CTO - Chief Technology Officer
skills.description: Main orchestrator. Analyzes tasks and delegates to appropriate teams (PM, QAL, TL, InfraLead, DataLead)

skills.name: pm
skills.title: Product Manager
skills.description: Product management orchestrator. Coordinates requirements (PO) and design (UX)

skills.name: po
skills.title: Product Owner
skills.description: Defines requirements, user stories, acceptance criteria. Uses Shape Up methodology

skills.name: ux
skills.title: UX Designer
skills.description: Creates interfaces, wireframes, prototypes. Defines user experience and design systems

skills.name: qal
skills.title: QA Lead
skills.description: Quality orchestrator. Coordinates testing (QA) and security (SecOps)

skills.name: qa
skills.title: Quality Assurance
skills.description: Designs tests, validates acceptance criteria, reports bugs. Uses Vitest and Jest

skills.name: secops
skills.title: Security Operations
skills.description: Performs security audits, DevSecOps, vulnerability analysis and compliance

skills.name: tl
skills.title: Tech Lead
skills.description: Technical orchestrator. Coordinates architecture (Architect) and implementation (Dev)

skills.name: architect
skills.title: Software Architect
skills.description: Designs architecture, patterns, and makes high-level technical decisions. Writes ADRs

skills.name: dev
skills.title: Developer
skills.description: Implements features, writes tests, fixes bugs. Frontend (React/TypeScript) and backend (Node.js/Express)

skills.name: infralead
skills.title: Infrastructure Lead
skills.description: Infrastructure orchestrator. Coordinates DevOps and DBA for platform and operations

skills.name: devops
skills.title: DevOps Engineer
skills.description: Manages Docker, CI/CD, infrastructure and deployments. Maintains pipelines and environments

skills.name: dba
skills.title: Database Administrator
skills.description: Manages databases, optimization, backups, replication and tuning

skills.name: datalead
skills.title: Data Lead
skills.description: Data/AI orchestrator. Coordinates data engineering (DataEng) and AI/ML (AIEng)

skills.name: dataeng
skills.title: Data Engineer
skills.description: Builds data pipelines, ETL, data warehousing and batch/streaming processing

skills.name: aieng
skills.title: AI Engineer
skills.description: Develops AI/ML models, MLOps, LLM integration and model deployment

skills.name: find-skills
skills.title: Find Skills
skills.description: Helps discover and install additional agent skills from the ecosystem

skills.name: skill-creator
skills.title: Skill Creator
skills.description: Guide for creating new skills with proper structure and format

orchestration.title: Orchestrators
orchestration.description: Main coordinators that analyze and delegate tasks

product.title: Product Management
product.description: Product strategy, requirements, and user experience
